content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5), boiler (position -13.5, 20.0), and offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5). The steam engine is currently not connected to a power network and has no input liquid, while the boiler is out of fuel.

### Pipe network
Consists of multiple pipe groups connecting various entities:
- PipeGroup 1 (fluid_system=34767) at position (-18.5, 16.5) is currently empty.
- PipeGroup 2 (fluid_system=34770) at position (-12.5, 21.5) is full of water.
- PipeGroup 3 (fluid_system=34773) at position (-9.5, 21.5) is currently empty.
- PipeGroup 4 (fluid_system=34778) at position (-10.5, 22.5) is currently empty.
- PipeGroup 5 (fluid_system=34779) at position (-6.5, 23.5) is currently empty.

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of a lab (position -17.5, 23.5) that is currently without power.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that the positions of the pipes you are trying to connect are valid and within range. Check for any obstructions or incorrect placements that may prevent the connection.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. Check for existing entities that may block the placement.
